programme.title: Meatballs
programme.desc: The wackiest head counsellor in North Star camp history, Tripper Harrison devotes his summer activities to cracking jokes, chasing female staffers, and plotting the demise of their evil rich rivals, the snotty young brats at nearby Camp Mohawk. Jam-packed with hysterical off-the-wall hjinks, drop-dead gorgeous babes in the woods and the riotous one-liners, Meatballs is an "Animal House goes to summer camp".

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: A self-centred TV weatherman is caught in a personal time warp, forced to relive one strange day over and over again. The jokes explode in this marvellously inventive and offbeat comedy.

programme.title: The Naked Gun
programme.desc: Incompetent detective Frank Drebin has to foil an attempt to assassinate the Queen as he woos Priscilla Presley.

programme.title: Flying High
programme.desc: An ex-fighter pilot who is afraid to fly is forced to take over the controls of an airliner when the flight crew succumbs to food poisoning.

programme.title: The Big Chill
programme.desc: Friends compare their '60s ideas with the harsh reality of their lives in the '80s, and discover that in a cold world, you need your friends to keep you warm.

programme.title: The Big Chill
programme.desc: Friends compare their '60s ideas with the harsh reality of their lives in the '80s, and discover that in a cold world, you need your friends to keep you warm.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: Larger than life, and blessed with a magical sense of serendipity, Ferris Bueller is a model for all those who take themselves too seriously.

programme.title: Meatballs

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men
programme.desc: When a lonely, flamboyant, middle-aged widow moves in across the street from them, the male rivalry between two neighbours begins.

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: A self-centred TV weatherman is caught in a personal time warp, forced to relive one strange day over and over again. The jokes explode in this marvellously inventive and offbeat comedy.

programme.desc: Incompetent detective Frank Drebin has to foil an attempt to assassinate the Queen as he woos Priscilla Presley.

programme.title: Flying High
programme.desc: An ex-fighter pilot who is afraid to fly is forced to take over the controls of an airliner when the flight crew succumbs to food poisoning.

programme.title: Uncle Buck
programme.desc: An idle, good-natured bachelor, Uncle Buck is the last person you would think of to watch the kids. However, during a family crisis, he is suddenly left in charge of his nephew and nieces.

programme.title: Casino
programme.desc: Greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two mobster best friends and a trophy wife over a gambling empire.

programme.title: Out of Africa
programme.desc: Karen Blixen establishes a plantation in Africa. Meeting her true love, Denys, allows her to rethink her priorities in the midst of this vast land.

programme.title: Legends of the Fall
programme.desc: When the sons of a cavalry colonel set out to fight a war in Europe, suspicion and jealousy threaten to tear apart their once indestructible bond when the sexy Susanna enters their lives.

programme.title: Frantic
programme.desc: In a hotel room in Paris, a doctor comes out of the shower and finds that his wife has disappeared. He soon finds himself caught up in a world of intrigue, espionage, gangsters, drugs and murder.

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: A gentle giant of a prisoner with supernatural powers brings a sense of spirit and humanity to the guards and inmates on death row.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A story of sex, thugs and rock 'n' roll. London is ground zero for the changing times with mobsters from the East and criminals from the streets all vying to change the rules.

programme.title: Rocketman
programme.desc: The story of Elton John's life, from his years as a prodigy at the Royal Academy of Music, through his influential and enduring musical partnership with Bernie Taupin.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: Pete and Ellie must learn the ropes of instant parenthood when they bring in three foster-children.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: A struggling hairdresser finds a renewed sense of purpose when she meets a widowed father and his two daughters.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: A struggling hairdresser finds a renewed sense of purpose when she meets a widowed father and his two daughters.

programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: Set during the tense 19 days of the Yom Kippur War in 1973. Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir is faced with the potential of Israel's complete destruction, and must navigate overwhelming odds, a skeptical cabinet, and a complex relationship with US Secretary of State Henry Kissinger. Her tough leadership and compassion would ultimately decide the fate of her nation and leave her with a controversial legacy around the world.

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Suffering from amnesia, Bourne has left his violent past behind and is living a normal life with Marie. His plans for a peaceful life are crushed when he narrowly escapes an assassination attempt.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A story of sex, thugs and rock 'n' roll. London is ground zero for the changing times with mobsters from the East and criminals from the streets all vying to change the rules.

programme.title: Rocketman
programme.desc: The story of Elton John's life, from his years as a prodigy at the Royal Academy of Music, through his influential and enduring musical partnership with Bernie Taupin.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: Pete and Ellie must learn the ropes of instant parenthood when they bring in three foster-children.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: A struggling hairdresser finds a renewed sense of purpose when she meets a widowed father and his two daughters.

programme.title: Sound of Metal
programme.desc: When ex-addict Ruben unexpectedly loses his hearing while touring with his girlfriend Lou, he becomes overwhelmed by anxiety and his life is thrown into turmoil. In a group home for Deaf addicts, Ruben must choose between his new Deaf community and the life of sound he left behind.

programme.title: Basic Instinct
programme.desc: Detective Nick Curran's investigation of a rock star's brutal murder leads him to glacial beauty and best-selling author Catherine Tramell. Despite Nick's entanglement with police psychologist Dr Beth Garner and the ever-present Roxy, Catherine's sultry and possessive girlfriend, the two begin a torrid affair. But when Nick discovers that Catherine's fictional, murderous storylines have a habit of coming true, he begins to wonder if his attraction to Catherine might turn out to be a fatal one.

programme.title: The Firm
programme.desc: A young gun takes a job in a law firm with connections to the Mafia and is soon caught up in blackmail.

programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Bernard Jordan, a World War II veteran, sneaks out of his care home to attend the 70th anniversary commemoration of the D-Day landings in Normandy.

programme.title: The Last Rifleman
programme.desc: World War II veteran Artie Crawford lives in Northern Ireland. After his wife's death, he decides to set off alone to France to attend the 75th anniversary of the D-Day landings.

programme.title: A Beautiful Day In The Neighborhood
programme.desc: The true story of a real-life friendship between beloved neighbour Fred Rogers and journalist Tom Junod.

programme.title: Sound of Metal
programme.desc: When ex-addict Ruben unexpectedly loses his hearing while touring with his girlfriend Lou, he becomes overwhelmed by anxiety and his life is thrown into turmoil. In a group home for Deaf addicts, Ruben must choose between his new Deaf community and the life of sound he left behind.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: A spy is on a mission to disprove false accusations made against him by the very government organisation that he works for.

programme.title: Tenet
programme.desc: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, The Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold into something beyond real time. Not time travel. Inversion.

programme.title: The Town
programme.desc: A bank robber falls in love with a former robbery hostage and decides he wants out of the life. With the Feds closing in he must choose: betray his friends or lose the woman he loves.

programme.title: Alexander
programme.desc: The towering, true story of Alexander the Great, who, in the 4th century BC, conquered Greece, Persia, Afghanistan and India - 90 percent of the 'known world'.

programme.title: Alexander
programme.desc: The towering, true story of Alexander the Great, who, in the 4th century BC, conquered Greece, Persia, Afghanistan and India - 90 percent of the 'known world'.

programme.title: The Forever Purge
programme.desc: The Purge reaches a boiling point as the violence spills over into a never-ending onslaught, and a Hispanic couple flee south to Mexico with the aid of a white rancher family.

programme.title: Sucker Punch
programme.desc: A young woman incarcerated in a psychiatric institution against her will creates a fantastical world within her imagination to help her and four other inmates escape from a frightening fate.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In this prequel to the blockbuster Mummy films, a mercenary is hired by a dissident alliance to kill the beautiful sorceress Cassandra, from whom the brutal tyrant Memnon draws his strength. Once Cassandra is removed the alliance plans to face Memnon's armies on their own terms, but the sorceress is not all she seems in this swirling, CGI-laden romp.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Forced into slavery by the corrupt heir to the throne, Roman general Maximus becomes a gladiator. His prowess in the arena leads him to Rome, the Colosseum, and a showdown with the new emperor.

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: After failing to fight for his family during a robbery, an unassuming father calls on skills from his hidden past to become a lethal vigilante blazing a wild ride to revenge.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer and death row inmate Cletus Kasady,

programme.title: Hypnotic
programme.desc: Determined to find his missing daughter, Austin detective Danny Rourke finds himself spiralling down a rabbit hole while investigating a series of reality-bending bank robberies.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: When genetically modified dinosaurs run amok at a new themed resort, a former military man and animal expert must use his special skills to halt an all-out prehistoric slaughter.

programme.title: Bad Boys For Life
programme.desc: The original Bad Boys are back! After a string of assassinations and an attempt on Mike's life, he convinces a hesitant Marcus to hold off retirement and partner one last time.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7
programme.desc: The lead-footed crew reunites in this turbo-fuelled tale of the vengeful brother of an international terrorist who sets his bloody sights on the boy racers that took his sibling down.

programme.title: The Fate of the Furious
programme.desc: Now that Dom and Letty are married, Brian and Mia have retired from the game, and the rest of the crew have been exonerated, the globetrotting team has found a semblance of a normal life. But when a mysterious woman seduces Dom into the world of crime he can't seem to escape, they will face trials that will test them as never before. From the shores of Cuba and the streets of New York City to the icy plains off the arctic Barents Sea, our elite force will criss-cross the globe to stop an anarchist from unleashing chaos on the world's stage, and bring home the man who made them a family.

programme.title: F9: The Fast Saga
programme.desc: The true meaning of family gets tested like never before as Dom Toretto takes the team on a worldwide ride with high-stakes action, old friends and a surprising new foe.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The Crawleys head to Northumberland for a shooting party at a castle, before returning to Downton to celebrate Christmas.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Between holding down the church and going on a rescue mission, our group is spread pretty thin. Is this going to be the breaking point?

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rules and morals have been tossed aside by new enemies. Rick will try to find a peaceful agreement, but they might prefer violence.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Will is brought on to track down a serial killer that created a human totem pole out of his victims. Before Will can do much investigating, he begins blacking out and losing time.

programme.title: Justified
programme.desc: Raylan's hunt for his stolen money leads to a confrontation with a brawler; Boyd and Ava face a decision that threatens to destroy them.

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: Colby goes head-to-head with veteran cop Bob Stephenson, who is convinced Alan is guilty of the cold case he's spent a lifetime investigating. Has Colby met his match?

programme.desc: Morgan's return to King County gets complicated when PADRE comes to collect.

programme.title: Telemarketers
programme.desc: After the FTC shuts CDG in 2009, copycat firms exploit loopholes. Sam and Pat chase the schemes as telemarketing dives further into a twisted underworld.

programme.title: The Paris Murders
programme.desc: A man comes forward to admit stabbing a woman to death in church, claiming to be possessed by a demon. Rocher thinks it could be a clever trick.

programme.desc: The police are working on a seemingly simple investigation of a drug ring, but it ends with dramatic consequences that take a toll on the team.

programme.title: Happiest Season
programme.desc: A holiday romantic comedy that captures the range of emotions tied to wanting your family's acceptance, being true to yourself, and trying not to ruin Christmas.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: An uptight English writer's book is a failure but a hit in Mexico. When he's invited there to promote it, he discovers his Spanish translator has rewritten his book as an erotic novel.

programme.desc: An Englishman learns that his fiance is the daughter of a mafia kingpin, and hilarity ensues as he adopts the Mafioso life.

programme.desc: Charlotte finally finds the man of her dreams only to discover that his mother is the woman of her nightmares.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: Discover Donna's young life, experiencing the fun she had with the three possible dads of Sophie. Sophie is now pregnant. Like Donna, she'll be a young mother, and she realizes that she'll need to take risks like her mother did.

programme.title: The Boss Baby: Family Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby continues to navigate the cutthroat corporate jungle gym of Baby Corp, while angling to achieve the near-impossible: the work-life balance of a modern career baby.

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Mildred's world is turned upside down when her estranged father, comes to look after her and agrees to take her camping to find the mythological beast, the Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: Spirit Untamed
programme.desc: The next chapter in this beloved franchise begins as a young girl finds a connection to her mother's legacy as a trick rider and forms a bond with a wild mustang named Spirit.

programme.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: It has been four years since the disaster at Jurassic Park and two groups are in a race against time that will determine the fate of the remote island's prehistoric inhabitants.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: George and Harold are fourth-grade BFFs who love dreaming up funny pranks. One day, they accidentally hypnotise their principal into believing he's a dimwitted hero named Captain Underpants. But when the new schoolteacher turns out to be a disgraced scientist bent on ridding the world of laughter, George, Harold and Captain Underpants must band together to stop his evil agenda.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: George and Harold are fourth-grade BFFs who love dreaming up funny pranks. One day, they accidentally hypnotise their principal into believing he's a dimwitted hero named Captain Underpants. But when the new schoolteacher turns out to be a disgraced scientist bent on ridding the world of laughter, George, Harold and Captain Underpants must band together to stop his evil agenda.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po is now living his dream as The Dragon Warrior. But his new life is threatened by the emergence of a formidable villain, who plans to use a secret weapon to conquer China.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: Set in the mythical world of burly Vikings and fire-breathing dragons, a Viking teenager takes in an injured dragon and sees an opportunity to set his tribe on a new course.

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: When a Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home, he finds himself lost and alone at Paddington Station. This charming family comedy is based on the classic children's books.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: Three unemployed henchmen find themselves working for the world's first-ever female supervillain and her inventor husband, who plan to take over the world.

programme.title: Richard the Stork and the Mystery of ...
programme.desc: Little sparrow Richard meets a flock of sparrows who are being held captive by the peacock Zamano. To regain their freedom, they have to go on a great adventure together and find a mysterious treasure.

programme.title: Balto
programme.desc: A true story of a sled dog who braved the Alaskan wilderness to carry life-saving medicine to a remote village in 1925. A remarkable tale of a hero who inspired a nation.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: The woodland friends awaken from their long winter's nap to discover that a large, green hedge has cropped up right through the middle of their once-natural habitat.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Stuart, the Little family's lonely mouse 'son', gets into strife by befriending a canary.

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep Movie
programme.desc: It's up to the most rascally sheep in England to bring the flock home when a caravan and a very steep hill lead them all to the big city.

programme.title: Wallace & Gromit: Curse Of Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: Wallace and Gromit's latest enterprise is Anti-Pesto, pest control with a heart. When called upon by the dotty Lady Tottington to solve her rabbit infestation, Wallace tangles with her Ladyship's would-be suitor, rotten cad Victor Quartermaine. At first Wallace and Gromit seem to have things in hand. But Wallace's mind transference device malfunctions, and he's in danger of being bagged by Quartermaine. Wallace teeters perilously close to disaster and his four-legged pal, Gromit, faces almost insurmountable odds to save the day!

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: A lawyer who has lost any memory that he was once the legendary Peter Pan must travel to Neverland, aided by Tinker Bell, to rescue his children from his nemesis, Captain Hook.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr, who's intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down, when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: Spirit is a wild and rambunctious stallion who travels across the frontiers of the Old West; where he befriends a young human and finds true love with a mare.

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: A small team embark on a dangerous task, searching through a deserted island inhabited by ferocious dinosaurs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: When the evil wizard Gargamel chases the tiny blue Smurfs out of their village, they tumble from their magical world into New York City.

programme.title: Smile 2
programme.desc: About to embark on a world tour, global pop sensation Skye Riley begins experiencing increasingly terrifying and inexplicable events. Overwhelmed by the escalating horrors and the pressures of fame, Skye is forced to face her past.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A young land clerk is summoned to a vampire's castle, while his wife falls under the spell of a dark force in her dreams, leading to a perilous journey into the unknown.

programme.title: Drive-Away Dolls
programme.desc: Free-spirited Jamie and her demure friend, Marian, embark on a road trip to Tallahassee for a fresh start, but things go wrong when they meet inept criminals along the way.

programme.title: Emmanuelle
programme.desc: Emmanuelle travels alone to Hong Kong on a business mission. In the vibrant and sensual global city, she indulges in intense encounters and new experiences.

programme.title: The Idaho Student Murders
programme.desc: Explores the rea - life horror that occurred in the idyllic town of Moscow, Idaho, where criminology student Bryan Kohberger faced four first-degree murder charges and the death penalty for the murder of four University students.

programme.title: The Convert
programme.desc: A preacher's violent past is drawn into question and his faith tested as he becomes caught up in a bloody war between Maori tribes after arriving at a British settlement in the 1830s.

programme.title: Spit
programme.desc: An ex-con returns to Australia after 20 years, gets detained, faces old enemies, makes new friends, and teaches his version of mateship while staying one step ahead.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: Tensions run high as producer Lorne Michaels and a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers prepare for the first broadcast of "Saturday Night Live" on Oct. 11, 1975.

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2
programme.desc: Now that Mac and Kelly Radner have a second baby on the way, they are ready to make the final move into adulthood: the suburbs. But just as they thought they'd reclaimed the neighbourhood and were safe to sell, they learn that the new occupants next door are a sorority even more out of control than Teddy and his brothers ever dreamed of being. Tired of their school's sexist, restrictive system, the unorthodox ladies of Kappa Nu have decided to start a house where they can do whatever the hell they want. When Shelby and her sisters, Beth and Nora, find the perfect place just off campus, they won't let the fact that its located on a quiet street stand in their way of parties as epic as the guys throw.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Can a clueless super spy save the day without denting the nation's pride, or his super-cool Aston Martin spy car?

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer and habitual liar discovers that he is unable to tell a lie or withhold the truth about anything for 24 hours after his son makes a birthday wish that comes true.

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: Nicholas Angel is a big-city cop who can't be stopped - but he's making everyone else on the force look bad. When he is reassigned to a small, quiet town, he struggles with this new, seemingly idyllic world and his bumbling partner. But their dull existence is interrupted by several grisly and suspicious accidents, and the crime-fighting duo turn up the heat and hand out high-octane, car-chasing, gun-fighting, big-city justice.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Fed up with answering to higher-ups, Nick, Kurt and Dale decide to become their own bosses and launch their own business. Soon, though, a slick investor pulls the rug out from under them. Outplayed and desperate, and with no legal recourse, the three would-be entrepreneurs hatch a misguided plan to kidnap the investor's adult son and ransom him to regain control of their company.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Fed up with answering to higher-ups, Nick, Kurt and Dale decide to become their own bosses and launch their own business. Soon, though, a slick investor pulls the rug out from under them. Outplayed and desperate, and with no legal recourse, the three would-be entrepreneurs hatch a misguided plan to kidnap the investor's adult son and ransom him to regain control of their company.

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: When a bunny is evicted from the Playboy mansion, she hops into the dying Zeta sorority house. Her tutorials in sexy charm make the girls more popular than ever.

programme.title: Tag
programme.desc: For one month every year, five highly competitive friends hit the ground running in a no-holds-barred game of tag they've been playing since the first grade, risking their necks, their jobs and their relationships to take each other down with the battle cry: "You're It!" This year, the game coincides with the wedding of their only undefeated player, which should finally make him an easy target. But he knows they're coming and he's ready.

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2
programme.desc: Mac and Kelly decide to sell and move to the suburbs. But when a sorority moves in and threatens the sale, they must team up with their former enemy Teddy, to bring the girls down.

programme.title: Bad News Bears
programme.desc: Grizzled former professional baseball player Morris Buttermaker (Billy Bob Thornton) is recruited by a strait-laced lawyer (Marcia Gay Harden) to coach the Bears, a woefully inept Little League team. He's got to find a way to drive this gang of 12 misfits to a championship against their hated rivals: the Yankees and their overbearing coach (Greg Kinnear). A hilarious homage to an irreverent 1976 comedy, THE BAD NEWS BEARS.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: After discovering their father didn't die when they were young, two brothers set off to find him. They end up learning more about their mother than they ever wanted to know.

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: Nicholas Angel is a big-city cop who can't be stopped - but he's making everyone else on the force look bad. When he is reassigned to a small, quiet town, he struggles with this new, seemingly idyllic world and his bumbling partner. But their dull existence is interrupted by several grisly and suspicious accidents, and the crime-fighting duo turn up the heat and hand out high-octane, car-chasing, gun-fighting, big-city justice.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Fed up with answering to higher-ups, Nick, Kurt and Dale decide to become their own bosses and launch their own business. Soon, though, a slick investor pulls the rug out from under them. Outplayed and desperate, and with no legal recourse, the three would-be entrepreneurs hatch a misguided plan to kidnap the investor's adult son and ransom him to regain control of their company.

programme.title: Gettin' Square
programme.desc: Barry has good intentions when he is released after eight years in prison, but finding a job is difficult with a prison record, and he can't keep his kid brother or his friend out of crime.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: A mild-mannered accountant whose glory days are behind him, bumps into a formerly nerdy classmate and is pulled into the high-stakes world of international espionage.

programme.title: Housos Vs. Authority
programme.desc: A petty crook embarks on a road trip to Uluru in a drug-laden campervan.

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: A one-night stand between a mismatched slacker and a career girl results in a pregnancy that leads to unlikely mutual support.

programme.title: Pineapple Express
programme.desc: Seth Rogen and James Franco channel Cheech and Chong in this hilarious comedy where lazy stoner Dale Denton (Rogen) becomes the only witness to a murder by a crooked cop and the city's most dangerous drug lord. Denton immediately heads to dealer Saul Silver's place and now they're up to their neck in all kinds of trouble and must run for their lives with the mobsters hot on their trail and out to silence them forever.

programme.title: Starsky & Hutch
programme.desc: Join uptight David Starsky and laid-back Ken 'Hutch' Hutchinson as they're paired for the first time as undercover cops and are forced overcome their differences to solve an important case.
